oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Traveling mirror
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This small, tri-fold traveling mirror belonged to one of the three Chapin brothers, possibly Decatur Chapin. Decatur G. Chapin served as a private in the 12th Ill. Inf. Regt. and later as Lt., Co. B, 55th United States Colored Troops before leaving to become Colonel of the 1st Tenn. Freedmen, Enrolled Militia, a home guard militia organized by the state of Tennessee.
